title: ChestCommands做商店格式！急！在线等！
author: 无恒
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
出售物品:(例:以100元出售一个钻石)
example:
    COMMAND: 'give: 264'
    PRICE: 100
    NAME: '购买一个钻石'
    ID: 264
    POSITION-X: 1
    POSITION-Y: 1复制代码
收购物品:(例:以10元收购64个泥土)
example:
     COMMAND: 'givemoney: 10'
    REQUIRED-ITEM: 3, 64
    NAME: 'Sell dirt'
    ID: 3
    POSITION-X: 1
    POSITION-Y: 1复制代码
转自http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-482226-1-1.html

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
1:
    COMMAND: 'give-money: 50'
    REQUIRED-ITEM: 'diamond, 1'
    NAME: '收购钻石，50元'
    ID: 1
    POSITION-X: 1
    POSITION-Y: 1

求最佳
